Title: Relates to requiring that certain information be provided to operators of limited use motorcycles
Summary: Relates to requiring that certain information be provided to operators of limited use motorcycles concerning rules of the road and consequences for non-compliance.
LawCode: Amd ยง2261, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring that operators of limited use motorcycles receive rules of the road pamphlets
